Description: ORIN number of the style to which the Demandware Master product is tied to.

Comments: Value will be Yes/No.
Values can be Ecomm,Store.

Description: Determines if the product is PO Box Shippable
Comments: Value will be true or false

Description: Indicating that the item is Dropship
Comments: Value will be true or false

Description: Indicates if the Product is PYG
Comments: Value will be Yes/No

Description: Indicates if the Product is GWP
Comments: Value will be Yes/No

Description: Indicates if the Product is PWP
Comments: Value will be Yes/No

Description: Indicates if the product can be Split to Split Color Groupings
Comments: Value will be Yes/No
Values will be Yes/No.
Values will be T or F or Yes or No

Description: Default SKU Code for the Master product.
Status to show if the item is a converted item
Comments: Value will be true or false

Description: Set restrictions that the SKU cannot be shipped to certain states.
Value from PIM indicating the use: Multi-valued field with list of state codes.
Comments: For SKUs that do not have a value in PIM, this attribute will not be populated.
For SKUs that do not have a value in PIM, this attribute may either not be populated or set to value 'N'

Description: ORIN number of the SKU in PIM

Comments: Values will be Yes/No.

Description: Flag to indicate if the item is sourced domestically
Comments: Has Values Domestic, Import
Value will be true or false
Values can be US, CA

Description: Flag to indicate if the item is IL only
Comments: Value will be true or false

Description: Indicates additional handling fee is added to the order.
Comments:
For SKUs that do not have a value in PIM, this attribute may either not be populated or set to value 'N'.
Note: The surcharge fee has to be configured in DWRE.

Description: This determines how much max quantity of an item can be purchased in a single order.
Comments:
For SKUs that do not have a value in PIM, this attribute may not be populated.
If the value is not populated the default value should be assumed be 24.

Description: Determines if an item is eligible for BOPIS
Comments: For SKUs that do not have a value in PIM, this attribute may either not be populated or set to value 'N'

Description: Determines if a SKU can be returned.
Comments: For SKUs that do not have a value in PIM, this attribute may either not be populated or set to value 'Y'

Description: Determines if a SKU can be exchanged.
Comments: For SKUs that do not have a value in PIM, this attribute may either not be populated or set to value 'Y'

Description: Determines if the SKU is a Hazardous material
Comments: For SKUs that do not have a value in PIM, this attribute may either not be populated or set to value 'N'

Description: Determines if the item should be shipped alone.
Comments: For SKUs that do not have a value in PIM, this attribute may either not be populated or set to value 'N'

Description: Determines if a the SKU has a restriction set on expedited shipping. If set, the SKU cannot be expedite shipped.
Comments: For SKUs that do not have a value in PIM, this attribute may either not be populated or set to value 'Y'
